Log:
MixUp App 1.9.2.2 - Update Highlights
- Added built-in AI ChromaKey for photos - Improved chroma key performance and fixed customization loss bug - Added Gemini AI for enhanced photo processing - Fixed KSUSE API invalid download link issue - Added camera preview recording at 60 / 120 / 240 fps (Glambot) - Added option to save Little Planet 360 previews from menu - Improved AI queue handling: failed sessions now go to the end - Added settings for AI download concurrency and timeout - Fixed Spinner + Glambot simultaneous use issue - Fixed project duplication/rename bug - Fixed AI render error flag reset - Added Canon USB reconnect dialog with Retry / Close options
